attributes.action: Ban MPs from using their phones in the Commons.
attributes.additional_details:
MP's  can get away with saying anything, if no one’s really listening.

On PMQ we see rows and rows of MPs gazing listlessly at their phones, like a vast roomful of bored teenagers, and on a very nice salary we pay for with our taxes.
attributes.background: Stop using phones in the commons.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616179
